entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 20 except minus 25 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 20 except minus 25 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 19 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 27 December 2022
